   128â†’  const handleSaveAll = async () => {
   129â†’    setIsSaving(true);
   130â†’    try {
   131â†’      // Save all fields that have changed
   132â†’      const changesFound: { dpackId: number, field: keyof FieldValues }[] = [];
   133â†’      
   134â†’      availableDpackIds.forEach(dpackId => {
   135â†’        const currentValues = values[dpackId];
   136â†’        const originalValues = initialValues[dpackId];
   137â†’        
   138â†’        if (currentValues && originalValues) {
   139â†’          (Object.keys(currentValues) as Array<keyof FieldValues>).forEach(field => {
   140â†’            if (currentValues[field] !== originalValues[field]) {
   141â†’              changesFound.push({ dpackId, field });
   142â†’            }
   143â†’          });
   144â†’        }
   145â†’      });
   146â†’      
   147â†’      for (const change of changesFound) {
   148â†’        await onSave(change.dpackId, change.field, values[change.dpackId]?.[change.field] || '');
   149â†’      }
   150â†’      
   151â†’      // Update initial values to reflect saved state
   152â†’      setInitialValues({ ...values });
   153â†’      
   154â†’      if (changesFound.length > 0) {
   155â†’        // Show success toast
   156â†’        showToast();
   157â†’        // Close after a short delay to let user see the toast
   158â†’        setTimeout(() => {
   159â†’          onClose();
   160â†’        }, 500);
   161â†’      } else {
   162â†’        onClose();
   163â†’      }
   164â†’    } catch (error) {
   165â†’      console.error('Error saving:', error);
   166â†’      alert('Failed to save changes');
   167â†’    } finally {
   168â†’      setIsSaving(false);
   169â†’    }
   170â†’  };

   173â†’    // Reset to initial values
   174â†’    setValues(initialValues);

   210â†’    );
